Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometricPrimitives.Shapes

        • geometricPrimitives.Square
  • Direct Known Subclasses:

    public class Square
extends Rectangle
    A class implementing the behavior of a square
    Author:
    Li Wing Yee
